public class ReviewSelectionListener
extends java.lang.Object

selectionChanged

public void selectionChanged(org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPart workbenchPart,
                             org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ISelection selection)
Notified when selection is changed. Brings the opened code review editor to top if a code review file is selected and the editor associated with the file is opened.

Specified by:
selectionChanged in interface org.eclipse.ui.ISelectionListener
Parameters:
workbenchPart - the workbench part containing the selection
selection - the current selection
